unnormalised: Basically, adaptive learning platforms use algorithms to personalize the learning experience. If Priya in Chennai is nailing calculus, she can move on. But if Akash is stumbling with basic algebra, the system provides targeted help, maybe even pulling in extra practice problems or short videos. Think personalized tutoring, but scaled up!
